steps.step: Take the dishes in which you will serve dessert. Put 2 tablespoons of yogurt and half the norm of cottage cheese on the bottom.
Next, put the banana, cut into circles.
Crumble cookies on top. Repeat the steps again.
Turn the dried apricots and raisins in a meat grinder. Chop the nuts.
Mix together nuts, dried fruits, add honey.
Sift the cocoa. Put candies on it.
Roll in cocoa from all sides.
Remove the zest from the oranges, and then squeeze out the juice.
Add the zest and starch to the juice, stir thoroughly
Separate the egg yolks from the whites and mix the yolks with sugar, the whites will not be needed.
Add the yolks and sugar to the orange juice in a saucepan, mix and put on a low heat. When the mixture is heated, addthe pieces of butter to the saucepan.
Stirring, cook the cream until thickened over low heat.
Pour the cream into a bowl and cool completely. Pour the orange custard into sterilized jars and store in the refrigerator.
